lenders.occupational_info:
I help food companies develop new products including formula (recipes), packaging and food safety. 

I assist with ensuring the product is sold to the consumer in the very best strategic manner  in order to reach the customers goals/vision/passion. 

Taste, Value, Convenience and Health are key  factors to a successful food product. 

I offer guidance and support to optimize success and instill confidence as their business idea progresses.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I believe in being an active member of the global community and I believe in micro-businesses and the opportunity to break the cycle of poverty.

lenders.name: Farmgirl Susan
lenders.occupation: sheep farmer & food/garden writer and photographer
lenders.loan_because: I think what Kiva is doing is wonderful!
lenders.occupational_info: I am thankful to live on a 240 acre remote Missouri farm where I naturally raise sheep, chickens, and donkeys, tend a large organic heirloom kitchen garden and greenhouse, bake bread, and always eat very well. Through my lighthearted blog, Farmgirl Fare, I share recipes, stories, and photos from my crazy country life with people all over the world, encouraging them to seek out local and organic food--and maybe even grow some of their own.

lenders.name: Jonathon
lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur I understand the difference a loan at the right time can make and I like the fact it goes directly & immediately to the entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I specialise in canadian art with a special focus on helping emerging artists earn a living.

lenders.name: Brooks
lenders.loan_because: I hope a small loan can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with groups of advisers who guide college students through their years in school.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: We have so much in America. I want to share that with those who are trying to help themselves. I think this is the key to peace in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I spent my working years teaching children (five year olds).

lenders.name: Rigel
lenders.loan_because: My daily goal is to accomplishing at least one good deed a day...we receive what we give.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with kids has taught me that they are usually smarter and less complicated than adults.

lenders.name: jennifer
lenders.loan_because: i believe that it's the right thing to do.  i feel lucky to be able to give someone a helping hand.

lenders.name: Timotao
lenders.loan_because: we get by with a little help from our friends.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software so others can build their homes and businesses.

lenders.name: Marco & Denise
lenders.loan_because: Nice to care

lenders.name: Womack/Crispin Family
lenders.loan_because: We can.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people any way I can!

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to get ahead
lenders.occupational_info: The company I work for provides gas service to homes and businesses.  I analyze and correct accounts that have billing problems.

lenders.name: Sharon-Mass.
lenders.loan_because: I want to pass on the gifts I have been blessed with by simply being born in this time and place.
lenders.occupational_info: I help elderly tell/publish their life stories and honor their histories by sharing them with the community.

lenders.name: Luis
lenders.loan_because: I believe people deserve an opportunity to 'light a candle rather than complain about darkness'
lenders.occupational_info: Medical doctor and universty professor. Keen on voluntary work.

lenders.name: Noah and Gavin
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we are lucky enough to be able to.  We know our blessings.  We admire the resourcefulness of many of these applicants, and if someone can help with so small a loan, why not? We love the idea of Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: Our mom is a teacher.  She loves working with children, and making learning interesting.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: It is a good feeling to help someone who needs help.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because:
Women of our world need a hand up, especially in developing countries.

I look forward to seeing "my ladies" become successful business owners!
lenders.occupational_info:
I teach at the college level and sub at the private elementary level, I also write and counsel.

What I do is all "people based", that is where my heart is and will always be.

My volunteer work spans decades and includes working with women and children in crisis.

lenders.name: Oren
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Rita C.
lenders.loan_because: Jesus tells us to care for and help others.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because:
-I can
-We live in a global economy where everyone  deserves a chance to compete and improve their standard of living.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software for the internet and general business communication.

lenders.name: Audrey Mariane
lenders.loan_because: It makes the difference, that bit of trust uplifts someones life.

lenders.name: Gus
lenders.loan_because: we want to help people.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Everyone is born into this world needing help.  I loan because I believe everyone deserves a chance to make the best life they can for themselves and their loved ones.

lenders.name: Annette
lenders.loan_because:
It is my hope that I can help other parents provide the education I was able to provide my children. I respect hard work and think Kiva is an excellent way to show that we are a global economy - and that we care.
It makes sense to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a homemaker and I work part-time in a small store.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: Recent graduate with a B.S. in Planning, Public Policy, and Management from the University of Oregon.

lenders.name: perla
lenders.loan_because: I WANT TO OPEN A ENGLISH SCHOOL IN BRAZIL, FOR THIS REASON I NEED MORE OR LESS $ 1000,00. THIS A CRISTINA MISSION, I´LL REALIZE THE DREAMS OF THE PEOPLE WITH THE ENGLISH IN YOUR LIFE.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.occupational_info: I sell seatbelts for industrial vehicles around the world.

lenders.name: Gabrielle
lenders.loan_because: So they can own their own money and feel good about themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Student in 6th grade

lenders.name: Liam&Toby
lenders.loan_because: It's fun and it's helping people.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students and nice guys.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school students about business.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I want to see people improve their standard of living and have more time for family and friends.
lenders.occupational_info: I design products for the house such as kitchen knives, cooking tools,  and pepper mills.  I also design train interiors, helping decide the shape and size of the seats, lights, doors, and other aspects.

lenders.name: Carrie Day
lenders.occupational_info: Carrie is teaches science to 13 and 14-year-old children.

lenders.name: Pedro Vapi
lenders.occupational_info: Computer Science engineer

lenders.name: Danielle & Charlie
lenders.loan_because: we love to help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I are both geologists for a petroleum company in Colorado.

lenders.name: Reva  of  LA. California
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in people, we are all one.We all deserve opportunity. Honesty,hard work and ambition I respect very much.It makes huge impact impact on me .  
I cannot afford  much, I wish I could. But I will loan as much and as often as I can , I know every little bit counts.
Good Luck & 
God bless you all.
-Reva

lenders.name: Jeannette
lenders.loan_because: I have raised my three sons, mostly as a single mom, and I like to help women who are trying to help themselves. I was lucky to have an education which gives me the power to control my life and take care of my family. I would like to pay it it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a school teacher who teaches math, reading, history, science, and writing to 11 year old children in the public school system.

lenders.name: Rosio
lenders.loan_because: anyone and everyone with the ability to help should do it.

lenders.name: Felicity
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for all that I have been given,  and wish to be able to share my blessings in some small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I give medical care to premature and sick babies.

lenders.name: Dirk
lenders.loan_because: because I have the assets to do so without problem, and it's the least I can do to try and make the world a bit fairer.

lenders.name: birdies
lenders.loan_because: It's a small way to make life better for people who have scarcity when I have abundance.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to teach boys and girls in school about the places all over the world.

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Muhammad Yunus' idea of harnessing the power of the free market to solve the problems of poverty, hunger, and inequality throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with electronics and computer programming to create smart, fun, and useful machines.

lenders.name: Seth
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I'm pretty fortunate (all things considered), and I feel that I should give a little back.
lenders.occupational_info: I help women, men, and children escape violent relationships.  I'm a student, and hope to become a counselor someday.

lenders.name: Jane & Paul
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed to live in Australia where raising credit for business development is not difficult. We would like to help others who are helping themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both Architects who design and develop commerical and residential buildings. We also teach architecture at the University.

lenders.name: Richie
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with many gifts and because of KIVA, many others like myself can share these gifts directly with others in this world.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.

lenders.name: Irene
lenders.loan_because: If it were my children  in need of a loan like this. I would hope that someone would be out there to help them.. and we are suppose to pay it forward.. so thats what I am doing..
lenders.occupational_info: I am a homemaker.

lenders.name: Marika
lenders.loan_because: I am so fortunate to be in a position to help people make their dreams come true and I'll do as much as I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist.

lenders.name: Stewart
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fair go

lenders.name: terry
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed
lenders.occupational_info: design construction equipment

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: it's gratifying to help real people and, in a small way, address the global issue of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I help immigrants and refugee adjust to life in the US

lenders.name: Keri & Tony
lenders.loan_because: We want to help.

lenders.name: SOHAIL
lenders.loan_because: Just like to help anybody when ever I can,as it can be very hard to break out of the poverty cycle.

lenders.name: T & D
lenders.loan_because: we have the obligation to assist those less fortunate in improving their lives.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: I like helping individuals directly.  These small amounts of money make a big difference in countries far away.  Kiva brings them close.

lenders.name: Dylan
lenders.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate and when I checked out the website I thought it was really cool.  I wanted to help someone who was very close to meeting their goal.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 7th grader in Littleton, CO.  I play basketball and baseball

lenders.name: Crezette, Australia
lenders.occupation: Trainer of assistant dogs for the disabled
lenders.loan_because: I am on an Australian Disability Pension and this would be a fortune to Kiva borrowers. So, I wanted; with my Gift Voucher, to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Disabled people need to have the freedom to lead a fulfilling and independant  life as possible. An assistance dog gives them a choice . I also train homo sapiens for pet dogs. No fees are charged hence the Gift Voucher.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: Everyone on this planet should be given a chance to have success.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I've traveled and realize that although I live in the U.S., I'm still a citizen of the world.  Helping people get started in a business may inspire them to help others someday too.  Hopefully, lighting one little fire will keep it going around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Am retired from the Air Force, and a couple of other things, but volunteer where I can in the community at the visitor's center, historical society, American Legion, and a couple of other things I can't recall at the moment.

lenders.name: nancy
lenders.occupation: mother, grandmother, part of the world\
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to live in a country where I have been able to see my family thrive. I want  my grandchildren to learn about the world and the great satisfaction that comes from helping others better their lives.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I love helping those who are prepared to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: Managing the design and construction of major buildings

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help women in need.
I am an entrepreneur and I want to help other women entrepreneur's.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at Lander University.  I am the liasion between the university and school districts.  I place students in schools for thier field experiences.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: we are all brothers and sisters sharing our Earth
lenders.occupational_info: sharing my knowledge to help others

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help people!

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I want to help change lives!
lenders.occupational_info: I lead a large team of accounting and finance people for a big food service company.  We feed people!

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I feel better knowing I'm helping someone to get a good start, like many people helped me in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I plan, organize and execute tests of ordering systems and the data that flows between them to ensure that telecommunications services can be successfully provided to businesses around the world.

lenders.name: Volcano
lenders.loan_because: I started a woman-owned business and am inspired by some of the people starting their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Earth scientist and have been studying polar climate change issues

lenders.name: Fr. Antonius Luluk
lenders.occupation: priest and director of socio-economic development

lenders.name: Denise Wakeman
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate to own my own successful service business. I want to share the fruits of my success and help other entrepreneurs be successful as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Online Business Strategist, Founder of The Blog Squad and Co-Founder of The Future of Ink. I also host the popular Hangout show and podcast, Adventures In Visibility.  I work with online entrepreneurs and small business owners to optimize, leverage, and strategically use social marketing tools to gain visibility, build credibility and make more money selling their products and services.  I've been quoted in the Wall Street Journal, Huffington Post, Newsday, FastCompany Online, and many other online and offline publications. I am passionate about travel and how it can inspire you to think bigger and go for what’s possible in your business and life.

lenders.name: Henry
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate the me.

lenders.name: Ed
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help other people and let's me use my contribution over and over! Also, I like to see who I'm helping and learn about their activities, something very difficult with most charities.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach research methods and statistics. I also consult in those areas

lenders.name: Mattea and Piers
lenders.loan_because: It doesn't matter if it's $25 or $250, it still makes a difference in someone's life. Also, helping someone in need is extremly rewarding.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I feel sorry for the people who have less then me.My mum often says no when i ask for something new and she says think of the poor, that has inspired me.I think everyone should have a great life.THANKYOU
lenders.occupational_info: I am a primary school student and I like and am good at literacy.

lenders.name: Cathie and Timon
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: We study human diseases to better understand how they work and to find new treatments.

lenders.name: Will
lenders.loan_because: I want to.

lenders.name: Nicola
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little to make a big difference in someone's life!  I am not wealthy, but it makes me feel like I can give a helping hand to women who are trying to help their families.  I am a dressmaker, so I usually loan to dressmakers in other countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a home improvement chain, processing returns to vendors and trying to recycle what I can to lessen the impact on the environment and reduce waste to landfills.

lenders.name: Shannon and Julie
lenders.loan_because: We want to help make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people selling, fabricating, fitting, and dispensing eyewear. Julie heads the revenue assurance department, a division of billing administration.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: It's cool to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the 9th grade.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I've started my own business, so I have a great deal of respect for all these entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to find new ways to use the internet to entertain and inform. Yes, there are a lot of people doing it, but one more can't hurt.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves.

lenders.name: RK & Tina
lenders.loan_because: Respect for, and belief in, small business owners and entrepreneurs worldwide.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: The empowerment of business success can transform attitudes and outlooks.
lenders.occupational_info: I measure business health and help people understand what my reports mean.

lenders.name: Mich
lenders.loan_because: I am from the US, but I grew up in Latin America.  I have been privileged to travel to many countries in South and Central America, the Caribbean, Africa, and Europe. Additionally, I am an entrepreneur and am in the process of starting my own business.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: To get a better rate of return while helping people who need the money at the same time.
